reviews.customers_say: Customers love this dress for its stretchy ribbed fabric that hugs the curves and reaches just above the ankles.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fits like a glove
items.body: Husband loves it. Very comfortable dress. The material is soft, stretchy and most importantly NOT see through. Read more
items.author: mel mel

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice dress for all shapes and sizes
items.body: Pleasantly surprised! The dress is a really nice quality, not super thin or overly thick. I'm 5'8" 210lbs and it comes to just above my ankles. I paired it with a harness belt I also got on Amazon and a pair of chunky boots and loved the look. Definitely a good buy Read more
items.author: L.G.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars so comfy
items.body: Love, I wore this dress for my family photos this year and I killed it. I am 5â€™8â€ 230 lbs with extra large breasts and I got the XL. It fit perfectly. Read more
items.author: ashly

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great maternity dress
items.body: Wore this for a maternity shoot when I was 9 months pregnant. It was stretchy but still held good shape. I am 5â€™9â€ and it was definitely long enough and at the time I was 220 and it still looked great. If I wasnâ€™t pregnant, Iâ€™d probably wear shapewear with it because it wouldnâ€™t hide or suck in anything. Read more
items.author: Emily M.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars WILL make you look like the Death of a Bachelor
items.body: I'm 5'9, ~155 lbs hourglass and bought a Medium in black. I love how this flatters my frame! I'm picky with fabric but liked the feel of this, it's surprisingly warm yet breathable! Slap a pair of chunky heels on with this dress and you will feel like a goddess. FYI, if you have any sort of belly this dress will find it and flaunt it. So make peace with your FUPA first mi chachas ðŸ§˜â€â™€ï¸ Seems slightly transparent so I wear it with thin shapewear, or under a long coat. Definitely will be a staple in my closet, there's so much layering potential for this piece! Read more
items.author: Berlin

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Ordered burgundy, got tomato red?? But good fit.
items.body: The fit is great if you don't mind every part of your silhouette showing. It is a bodycon dress after all. The material is quite thin, so it won't keep you warm. It's good for indoors or on a mild day. The quality is to be expected- cheap but not see through as far as transparency, but again, very bodycon so expect lumps and bumps to show. Overall, I will keep it, but my issue is the color. I ordered burgundy and got a tomato red color. I'm not sure if they sent me red on accident or if the burgundy is misrepresented. I'll reorder to try again. Annoying that I have to return it. Read more
items.author: M. Henson

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars One of my best purchases
items.body: I absolutely love this dress and I will purchase another black one, and a couple of the other colors. This dress is comfortable, stylish, and classy. This dress can be dressed up or down. Read more
items.author: tamara newton

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars 5â€™9 Gal
items.body: Nice material and form fitting. Highly recommended Read more
items.author: Kongsavanh Phanthalasy

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Bodycon is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Bodycon is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red, Purple, Burgundy, Royal Blue, Black, Navy Blue, Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.
